Görev tekrarlanırken başlangıç ve bitiş tarihi tekrarlama sıklığını göre yeniden ayarlanır.

Hide Module You can hide any module that you do not needed in the [Settings]-[Display] page. Reminder Sound The reminder sound effect volume is controlled by the system media volume.

And you can disable all sound effect in the Cutsom Settings page. Step Counter The app cannot access the daily step count from the system.
Out step count is calculated by the difference of the total step count.

 The accuracy of counting depends on conditions such as when the app is opened and the phone restarts. As an alternative to automatic calculation, you can input the step number manually

or hide the step counter module in the [Display Settings] page if you do not need it.
Hello, World! In the world module, you can join in a team to get a team task/or share your task by creating a new team. Post Activities After completing a team task, you can post your activities or feelings of it with text and photos to the world. Creative Market View the creative shop items created by people all around the world.

And you can share your masterpieces!
ATM interest You can setup the ATM interest in the Shop Settings (the entrance is near by the ATM) to receive a daily interest.
Probability The actual probability calculation formula of the item: the probability of the item ÷ the sum of the probabilities of all items.

For example, if you want to create a item named A with 0.1% probability:
Select item A and input 1% into its probability, and then select another item named B and input 999% into its probability.
Finally the probability of item A will be 0.1% and the item B will be 99.9%. Don't prompt temporarily Edit List
Uncomplete a task There are many ways to undo complete tasks:
1. Tap the undo button on the bottom popup window when completing a task.

2. Goto [History] or [Calendar] page and then tap the undo button.

3.check the [Show completed] checkbox in the top-right menu, and then tap the completed mark of the task.
Exp Punishment You will lose some of exp when the task is overdue or given up.

If you have actually completed the task, you can mark it as completed and regain the reward.
Coin Punishment The coin punishment function is disable by default.

You can goto the [Custom Settings] page to enable it and adjust the level of coin punishment and exp punishment.
